benchmark_details.name: MetaVQA
benchmark_details.overview: MetaVQA is a comprehensive benchmark designed to assess and enhance vision language modelsâ€™ understanding of spatial relationships and scene dynamics through Visual Question Answering (VQA) and closed-loop simulations.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate and improve embodied scene understanding of vision language models.

data.source: nuScenes and Waymo Open Motion datasets
data.annotation: Generated via automated methods using Set-of-Mark prompting.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the model's responses to the questions and their effectiveness in a simulated environment.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better embodied scene understanding.
methodology.validation: The benchmark is validated through experiments showing improved performance of VLMs when fine-tuned with the dataset.
